ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Solo farming
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh thx man, I know u will never fail to give me solid wiz advice ;P Just 1 thing, I heard Bafallen undeads con aggro to u even lvl 50 and becoz they can see
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh thx man, I know u will never fail to give me solid wiz advice ;P

Just 1 thing, I heard Bafallen undeads con aggro to u even lvl 50 and becoz
they can see normal invis, they will all train to u when u walk pass them?


On Friday, 28 April, 2000 1:40 AM, Diablo [SMTP:diablo99@...]
wrote:
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> Sent: 27 April 2000 18:05
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Solo farming
>
>
> > Can someone tell me the min lvl for a wiz to solo the following
dungeons:
> >
> > Permafrost (up to King room)
> You can solo the whole area up to King room at your level (40?) Preacher
you
> may have a bit of direct confrontation, same goes with king room and
maybe
> scryer. The rest should be np.
>
> > Sol A (whole dungeon)
> Sol A : All goblin spawns including efreeti,kindle and singe can be
killed
> at level 40 with a bit of skill and know where to stand to root/nuke etc.
To
> fight lava elemental, gabbie, captain bipnupple recommended 46 if not all
> the gnomes will join and whack you. When fighting gabbie make sure your
fire
> resist is very high she nukes fast and pain so best to kill at level 50.
> Same goes with lava elemental because it is a level 35-36 mob and very
hard
> to kite in his room.
>
> > Sol B (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> Perhaps the only thing a level 50 wizzie can solo in Sol B is the kobold
> noble, even then it is still a very tough fight as he is a 37ish
enchanter.
> And you probably have to clear all the surrounding mobs to solo pull him.
>
> > Unrest (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> You can solo whole unrest at 40 assuming you have wolfform, all spawns
> except ghost of unrest is easy at that level. For ghost of unrest, you
have
> to be high level enough so that all the spawns surrounding ghost are
green
> then you can kite the ghost up to the garden. Assuming you have no wol
fform,
> knight is easy, barkeep you have to clear most spawns in his room, priest
of
> najena is easy, reclusive magi have to clear his room too and perhaps
some
> other spawns like the gnome that drops pugius are easy too
>
> > Paw (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> Cant farm in paw imo, anyway not much to farm in paw except gnollhide
tome
> and robe of ishva and those are on lvl 40 mobs.
>
> > Befallen (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> Whole dungeon should be np, befallen mobs work like as long as they are
> green to you they wouldnt touch you as long as you dont sit/med.
>
> > Beholder Maze (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> Evil eyes range from lvl 18-25 so a level 30 wizard should be able to
solo
> them. Nothing much worthy of mention in this place.
>
> > Runnyeye (whole dungeon or max which area/wat lvl)
> Runnyeye = train city as the elite goblins even though they are green
will
> agro you and the area is so small theres hardly a safe spot to pull your
> rare spawns to. Assuming you can clear your path, king should be easy.
Borxx
> you will need at least 34 to solo while the goblin warlord is relatively
> easy.
>
> > WK Ogre Camp
> Level 49 recommended. If not when you are forced to pull an ogre guard in
> the initial splitting of spawns (have to pull it first), chief goonda
will
> join in and cause a lot of problems.
>
> > SRo Sprectre Island
> Sro not spectre island. Perhaps you talking about oasis. If you pull
> spectres in oasis, all 3/4/5 depending on luck will come as they are very
> close to each other. Same goes with the spectre island in OOT. So
> recommended level is 49 when about 2/3 spectres are green to you and 1/3
> blue.
>
> > CT
> CT is moderately hard but not impossible so you must learn wher to
med/camp
> etc Best to solo if all mobs are green to you, so about 46/7/8+.
>
> For stone golem (RV gauntlets) you can either clear all the gators in the
> water in the stone golem area or invis and chiong in and water fight with
> the stone golem. He is very strong therefore you will have a high chance
of
> dying against him so recommended lvl 49/50.
>
> Iron golem the one that drops RV helm spawns in 3rd floor of throne room.
> Behind that area is a passageway where 1 roamer walks by. Root nuke and
> kill the roamer and start agro radius pulling (walk close to the mob just
> enough to pull 1 and not all, hard to explain) the iron golem room (3
> spawns). Beware there are many healers in CT, but ice cometting should
kill
> them fast.
>
> Tae Ew Diviner (RV bracer) and Templar (RV Leg) is easier. IF you are an
> erudite wizard you will have a minor advantage here as gorillas do not
agro
> erudites and dwarfs. Diviner has 2 gorilla guards so if the 2 gorillas
are
> green and you are an erudite wizard you can solo pull templar. Diviner
and
> templar are lower level so about level 44 can solo them. When you go
into
> throne, turn left and you will enter a small passageway with 2 spawns at
2
> ends. Clear both spawns then walk to end of passageway, you should see
the
> diviner or his ph. Solo the diviner/ph then start strafing against the
wall
> so that you can see gorilla/templar then just nuke to pull.
>
> Archon (RV arms) I cant really comment but he is about level 33-35.
>
> Avatar of fear (RV BP) Level 49/50 needed. Camp at the very long
passageway
> leading to his green bubble. Clear roamers in passageway then 3 spawns on
> the top pool of water. Go into bubble just nice to pull the Aof and
quickly
> run back into the door then start root/kite/nuke along the long
passageway.
> He is about level 37/38 so is dangerous. Once you clear aof you can
continue
> to clear Cazic Cenobite (RV boots) by just swimming down the bubble and
> pulling him up to passageway and do the root/nuke.
>
> I missed out some spawns like clay golem etc, those should be easy (level
> 25-30 mobs)
>
> > Thx.
> >
> > Ziltus
> >
> Kunark items are better than dragon items and dont need so many pple to
kill
> ;)
>
> Mzy
> Lanys T`vyl
> 50mnk/clr/dru/wiz
>
